name.message: styleGPT - The Best Customizer for ChatGPT

description.message: ü§ñüß© styleGPT is an extension that change style from chatGPT web üê¶üåà

notificationNotMatch.message: You are not in chatGPT page.
notificationNotMatch.description: Popup notifications - chatGPT web not match message.

notificationArchived.message: Due to numerous changes on the ChatGPT web platform, StyleGPT will be archived until further notice. This means its functionality will be disabled to prevent future incompatibilities. If you wish, you can uninstall the extension.

notificationGeneralError_title.description: Popup notifications - General error part message.

notificationGeneralError_subtitle.description: Popup notifications - General error part message.

notificationGeneralError_text.message: This could be due to several reasons:
notificationGeneralError_text.description: Popup notifications - General error part message.

notificationGeneralError_reason1.message: False alarm: if so, refreshing the page should solve it. Check it out!
notificationGeneralError_reason1.description: Popup notifications - General error part message.

notificationGeneralError_reason2.message: Error caused by OpenAI.com: StyleGpt is created from the GPT chat page and if it changes drastically, StyleGpt will no longer be visible until updated. If this is the issue, you'll have to wait for StyleGpt to be updated.
notificationGeneralError_reason2.description: Popup notifications - General error part message.
